ui.loyaltyProgram.description: Convert your partecipation into precious points. The loyalty program is simple and full of advantages.
ui.LoyaltyProgramDetail.description: Your participation has a value. Every contribution gives value to the discussion and increases your score.
ui.LoyaltyProgramDetail.list:
• Post published: +2 points
  • Discussion published: +2 points
  • Comment published: +1 point
  • Like received: +1 point
  • Follower: +1 point
  • Share content on your social accounts: +1 point
  • First App use: +10 points
  • Daily Community visit: +1 point
